Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the high quality it offers, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering the value this product provides, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and expertise that have gone into creating something truly exceptional. I trust that you will find immense value in this investment. If you're interested in discussing further or have any questions, please let me know. I look forward to potentially bringing this product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
